general_advisory: District Jajpur likely to receive dry weather for 2 days & light rain for 3 days with clear sky to generally cloudy sky. Maximum temp 30-34°C, minimum temp 21-23°C. Wind speed 11-17km/h.

advisory: Drain out excess water from paddy field & regular surveillance work should be taken up in all crops.
Collect setts from the whole cane of a 6-8 month-old plant crop free from diseases and insect pests.
Sett Rot management - To manage sett rot disease after planting basal drenching with Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% @ 400-gram/acre.
To reduce incidence of Powdery mildew, Anthracnose & Stem rot in blackgram spraying of (Tebuconazole + Sulphur) @ 500g/acre recommended.
The mustard/Toria crop is at the flowering to pod filling stage.
Spraying Of Acephate @250g/acre along with neem oil formulation 600ml/acre to minimize damage caused by Red Pumpkin Bettle in cucurbits.
Farmers should start sowing of tomato seed for summer cultivation in nursery bed because prevailing temperature suitable for germination of seed.
Small white rash appear on the body of fish and feels rough to hand are the symptoms of white spot disease in fish.

Animals should be given mineral mixture along with salt regularly and wheat grains, jaggery etc. may be provided @ 10% -20% in the daily ration during winter season to meet the energy requirement of the animals.
